languages.text: {n}Служительница Хаоса насмешливо разводит руками.{/n} "Но прежде чем вы оскорбите мой слух новыми обвинениями или тем более нравоучениями... вспомните, кто удержал этот мир от гибели, когда Простор начал содрогаться от ярости варпа. Вспомните, кто все эти десятилетия безукоризненно служил вашей династии. Вспомните, кому ваша предшественница доверила один из ценнейших миров, не опасаясь измены или интриг! Без меня Янус превратится в ничто!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Служительница Хаоса насмешливо разводит руками.{/n} "Но прежде чем вы оскорбите мой слух новыми обвинениями или тем более нравоучениями... вспомните, кто удержал этот мир от гибели, когда Коронус начал содрогаться от ярости варпа. Вспомните, кто все эти десятилетия безукоризненно служил вашей династии, еще более возвеличивая имя фон Валанциус. Вспомните, кому ваша предшественница доверила один из ценнейших миров, не опасаясь измены или интриг! Без меня Янус превратится в ничто!"

languages.text: {n}The servant of Chaos shrugs glibly.{/n} "But before you offend my ears with more accusations or moral admonitions... remember who held this world back from the brink of death when the Expanse began shaking from the fury of the warp. Remember who has dutifully served your dynasty all these years. Remember to whom your predecessor entrusted one of her most valuable worlds, without fear of treachery or conspiracy! Janus would have become nothing without me!"
languages.original_text: {n}Служительница Хаоса насмешливо разводит руками.{/n} "Но прежде чем вы оскорбите мой слух новыми обвинениями или тем более нравоучениями... вспомните, кто удержал этот мир от гибели, когда Простор начал содрогаться от ярости варпа. Вспомните, кто все эти десятилетия безукоризненно служил вашей династии. Вспомните, кому ваша предшественница доверила один из ценнейших миров, не опасаясь измены или интриг! Без меня Янус превратится в ничто!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The servant of Chaos shrugs glibly.{/n}"But before you offend my ears with more accusations or moral admonitions... remember who held this world back from the brink of death when the Koronus began shaking from the fury of the Warp. Remember who has dutifully served your dynasty all these years. Remember to whom your predecessor entrusted one of her most valuable worlds, without fear of treachery or conspiracy! Janus would have become nothing without me!"

Remember who has dutifully served your dynasty all these years. Remember to whom your predecessor entrusted one of her most valuable worlds, without fear of treachery or conspiracy! Janus would have become nothing without me!"

Remember who has dutifully served your dynasty all these years. Remember to whom your predecessor entrusted one of her most valuable worlds, without fear of treachery or conspiracy! {n}The servant of Chaos shrugs glibly.{/n}"But before you offend my ears with more accusations or moral admonitions... remember who held this world back from the brink of death when the Expanse began shaking from the fury of the warp. Remember who has dutifully served your dynasty all these years. Remember to whom your predecessor entrusted one of her most valuable worlds, without fear of treachery or conspiracy! Janus would have become nothing without me!"

languages.text: {n}这位混沌的仆人不以为然地耸了耸肩。{/n}“不过，在您把更多的指责与道德训诫灌进我的耳朵之前……别忘了，当科罗努斯扩区在亚空间的愤怒中颤抖时，是谁把这个世界从灭亡的边缘拉了回来。别忘了，这么多年来，是谁一直在尽职尽责地为您的王朝服务。别忘了，您的前任行商浪人是把她最有价值的世界安安心心地托付给了谁，完全不用担心背叛或阴谋！如果没有我，加努斯将一无所有！”
languages.original_text: {n}The servant of Chaos shrugs glibly.{/n} "But before you offend my ears with more accusations or moral admonitions... remember who held this world back from the brink of death when the Expanse began shaking from the fury of the warp. Remember who has dutifully served your dynasty all these years. Remember to whom your predecessor entrusted one of her most valuable worlds, without fear of treachery or conspiracy! Janus would have become nothing without me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这位混沌的仆人不以为然地耸了耸肩。{/n}“不过，在您把更多的指责与道德训诫灌进我的耳朵之前……别忘了，当科罗努斯扩区在亚空间的愤怒中颤抖时，是谁把这个世界从灭亡的边缘拉了回来。别忘了，这么多年来，是谁一直在尽职尽责地为您的王朝服务。别忘了，您的前任行商浪人是把她最有价值的世界安安心心地托付给了谁，完全不用担心背叛或阴谋！如果没有我，加努斯将一无所有！”

languages.text: {n}La sirvienta del Caos se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Antes de que ofenda a mis oídos con más acusaciones o reproches moralistas... recuerde quién evitó que este mundo muriera cuando la Extensión empezó a temblar ante la furia de la disformidad. Recuerde quién ha servido fielmente a su dinastía durante todos estos años. ¡Recuerde a quién encomendó su predecesora la gestión de uno de sus mundos más valiosos, sin temer traición o conspiración alguna! Sin mí, ¡Janus no sería nada!».
languages.original_text: {n}The servant of Chaos shrugs glibly.{/n} "But before you offend my ears with more accusations or moral admonitions... remember who held this world back from the brink of death when the Expanse began shaking from the fury of the warp. Remember who has dutifully served your dynasty all these years. Remember to whom your predecessor entrusted one of her most valuable worlds, without fear of treachery or conspiracy! Janus would have become nothing without me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La sirvienta del Caos se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Antes de que ofenda a mis oídos con más acusaciones o reproches moralistas... recuerde quién evitó que este mundo muriera cuando la Extensión empezó a temblar ante la furia de la disformidad. Recuerde quién ha servido fielmente a su dinastía durante todos estos años. ¡Recuerde a quién encomendó su predecesora la gestión de uno de sus mundos más valiosos, sin temer traición o conspiración alguna! Sin mí, ¡Janus no sería nada!».

languages.text: {n}混沌の従者は肩をすくめて饒舌に話す。{/n}「ですが、これ以上、耳障りの悪い誹謗と道徳的指導を受ける前に…エクスパンスが歪みの怒りで震え始めたとき、死の瀬戸際にあったこの星を取り戻したのは誰かを思い出していただきたい。ヴァランシウス王朝に長年忠誠をもって尽くしてきたのは誰か。先代当主に、背信の恐れも謀略の恐れもないとして最も価値ある星を委託されたのは誰か！私なしに今のヤヌスはあり得ないのです！」
languages.original_text: {n}The servant of Chaos shrugs glibly.{/n} "But before you offend my ears with more accusations or moral admonitions... remember who held this world back from the brink of death when the Expanse began shaking from the fury of the warp. Remember who has dutifully served your dynasty all these years. Remember to whom your predecessor entrusted one of her most valuable worlds, without fear of treachery or conspiracy! Janus would have become nothing without me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}混沌の従者は肩をすくめて饒舌に話す。{/n}「ですが、これ以上、耳障りの悪い誹謗と道徳的指導を受ける前に…エクスパンスが歪みの怒りで震え始めたとき、死の瀬戸際にあったこの星を取り戻したのは誰かを思い出していただきたい。ヴァランシウス王朝に長年忠誠をもって尽くしてきたのは誰か。先代当主に、背信の恐れも謀略の恐れもないとして最も価値ある星を委託されたのは誰か！私なしに今のヤヌスはあり得ないのです！」

languages.text: {n}Die Dienerin des Chaos zuckt leichthin mit den Schultern.{/n} "Aber bevor Ihr meine Ohren mit weiteren Anschuldigungen oder Moralpredigten beleidigt ... bedenkt, wer diese Welt vor dem Untergang bewahrt hat, als die Ausdehnung unter dem Zorn des Warp zu erzittern begann. Bedenkt, wer Eurer Dynastie all die Jahre pflichtbewusst gedient hat. Bedenkt, wem Eure Vorgängerin eine ihrer wertvollsten Welten anvertraut hat, ohne Angst vor Betrug oder Verschwörung! Ohne mich wäre aus Janus nichts geworden!"
languages.original_text: {n}The servant of Chaos shrugs glibly.{/n} "But before you offend my ears with more accusations or moral admonitions... remember who held this world back from the brink of death when the Expanse began shaking from the fury of the warp. Remember who has dutifully served your dynasty all these years. Remember to whom your predecessor entrusted one of her most valuable worlds, without fear of treachery or conspiracy! Janus would have become nothing without me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Dienerin des Chaos zuckt leichthin mit den Schultern.{/n} "Aber bevor Ihr meine Ohren mit weiteren Anschuldigungen oder Moralpredigten beleidigt ... bedenkt, wer diese Welt vor dem Untergang bewahrt hat, als die Ausdehnung unter dem Zorn des Warp zu erzittern begann. Bedenkt, wer Eurer Dynastie all die Jahre pflichtbewusst gedient hat. Bedenkt, wem Eure Vorgängerin eine ihrer wertvollsten Welten anvertraut hat, ohne Angst vor Betrug oder Verschwörung! Ohne mich wäre aus Janus nichts geworden!"

languages.text: {n}La servante du Chaos hausse les épaules avec désinvolture.{/n} « Mais avant que vous ne m'insultiez en proférant d'autres accusations ou réprimandes... rappelez-vous qui a redonné vie à ce monde qui était à l'article de la mort lorsque la colère du Warp a secoué les Étendues. Rappelez-vous qui a consciencieusement servi votre dynastie pendant toutes ces années. Rappelez-vous à qui votre prédécesseure a confié l'un de ses mondes les plus précieux, sans craindre de trahison ni de complot ! Sans moi, Janus ne serait rien ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The servant of Chaos shrugs glibly.{/n} "But before you offend my ears with more accusations or moral admonitions... remember who held this world back from the brink of death when the Expanse began shaking from the fury of the warp. Remember who has dutifully served your dynasty all these years. Remember to whom your predecessor entrusted one of her most valuable worlds, without fear of treachery or conspiracy! Janus would have become nothing without me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La servante du Chaos hausse les épaules avec désinvolture.{/n} « Mais avant que vous ne m'insultiez en proférant d'autres accusations ou réprimandes... rappelez-vous qui a redonné vie à ce monde qui était à l'article de la mort lorsque la colère du Warp a secoué les Étendues. Rappelez-vous qui a consciencieusement servi votre dynastie pendant toutes ces années. Rappelez-vous à qui votre prédécesseure a confié l'un de ses mondes les plus précieux, sans craindre de trahison ni de complot ! Sans moi, Janus ne serait rien ! »

languages.text: {n}Kaos'un uşağı, üstünkörü bir omuz silkiyor.{/n} "İthamlarınızı ve ahlaki öğütlerinizi yüzüme vurmadan önce bir düşünün... Enginlik, öteboyutun hiddetiyle sarsılmaya başladığında bu dünyayı ölümün eşiğinden kim döndürdü? Bunca senedir hanedanlığınıza görev borcunu kim bilfiil ödedi? Selefiniz, ihanet veya komplo korkusu olmadan en mühim dünyalarından birini kime emanet etti? Bensiz Janus bir hiç olurdu!"
languages.original_text: {n}The servant of Chaos shrugs glibly.{/n} "But before you offend my ears with more accusations or moral admonitions... remember who held this world back from the brink of death when the Expanse began shaking from the fury of the warp. Remember who has dutifully served your dynasty all these years. Remember to whom your predecessor entrusted one of her most valuable worlds, without fear of treachery or conspiracy! Janus would have become nothing without me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kaos'un uşağı, üstünkörü bir omuz silkiyor.{/n} "İthamlarınızı ve ahlaki öğütlerinizi yüzüme vurmadan önce bir düşünün... Enginlik, öteboyutun hiddetiyle sarsılmaya başladığında bu dünyayı ölümün eşiğinden kim döndürdü? Bunca senedir hanedanlığınıza görev borcunu kim bilfiil ödedi? Selefiniz, ihanet veya komplo korkusu olmadan en mühim dünyalarından birini kime emanet etti? Bensiz Janus bir hiç olurdu!"
